apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: NES, SNES, GB(C), GBA, and N64 game emulator
apps.versionDescription:
Fixed exporting save file without file extension
Fixed interface rotating when playing WarioWare: Twisted!
Fixed Pokemon Black & White (2) freezing with C-Gear enabled
The next big beta feature is here: AltStore now supports 3rd party app sources! Add sources in the Browse tab to expand the number of apps available to download through AltStore.

NEW FEATURES
• Initial support for 3rd party sources
• Activate and deactivate apps via drag & drop
• Option to remove app extensions from apps to save active app slots

BUG FIXES
• Fixes issue causing .ipa files to appear disabled in document picker
• Fixes issue causing refreshing to sometimes not finish when using older AltServer
• Fixes "invalid app group" error when installing apps
• Removes cached apps after they have been uninstalled
• Fixes peek & pop on iOS 12

PREVIOUS BETA
• Adds support for activating/deactivating apps to stay under iOS 13.3.1 active app limit
• Significantly improves performance when refreshing apps
• Improves error messages when refreshing apps
• Improves stability when refreshing apps over WiFi

NOTE: Support for 3rd party sources will be disabled in public versions of AltStore until it is finished.

news.caption: Finally, relive your favorite NES, SNES, GB(C), GBA, and N64 games.
news.title: Delta Now Available
